import React from 'react'; import '../App.css'; import {Login_Button} from './Login_Button'; import { Logout_Button } from './Logout_Button'; import { Button } from './Button'; import './HeroSection.css'; import useAuth from '../Auth/useAuth'; import { callmodal } from './Navbar'; function HeroSection() { const { auth } = useAuth(); return (
); } export default HeroSection;
